--- In nbwrpg@y..., robertdahl <rdahl@t...> wrote:
> Beachcomber nods, but he noticed they had drawn their guns, that 
wasnt
> good. He flailed his arms to try and get them to calm down.
> 
______________________________________________________________________
> Cliffjumper was aiming. "Ready, aim...." But was interupted by
> Firedrill. "No Cliffjumper." He shouted. A sheet of glass descended 
out
> of his helmet and over his eyes. The picture he was looking through
> began to zoom in, and record areas of energy, like guns on Redhot's
> shoulders, underground veins of oil and other sources, and then 
zoomed
> in and identified Beachcomber. "It's Beachcomber," He said 
extatically.
> He then zoomed in on the other, "and he's with a seeker," he paused,
> "With an Autobot symbol?" He said with confusion. Cliffjumper 
sighed. He
> was to rash, and almost filled a friend full of holes. "You guys 
wait
> here, I'll see whats happening." He said, transforming, and quickly
> accelerating to his max speed up the hill.


::REDHOT::

    Redhot watched wih amusement as Beachcomber tried to wave down
his comrads. He, too, had noticed that they had their weapons drawn 
but he didn't let his momentary panic show. He stood with his arms 
crossed around his chest (or at least 
as well as is physiology would alaow him) and he watched one of the 
robots below speedily decend upon them.
    "This..." he said, his red eyes surprisingly calm, "should be 
interesting."

Northlight
Domnijoe Productions
